name: Sound Cage
description:
Sound Cage was developed by a team of students as an academic project for a Master's course in Game Design & Development.

In a world full of external influences where extroverts are privileged because of their way of navigating social situations, we follow the path of a particularly introverted protagonist who tries to overcome their social anxiety and avoid the noise of a society that is incompatible with their social and psychological characteristics. With help, Bug learns to deal with the hardships of the external world in a healthy way, and to integrate themself into society without being forced to be uncomfortable in their own skin, reaching self-acceptance.
